reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I won't repeat what everyone else has said but simply confirm it is true. In particular the hosts are 1st class, the food plentiful etc.
reviews.title: what it says on the tin & more

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Some other comments we never read before staying:- rooms have hairdryers; rooms have flat screen TVs with HDMI connection if you want to connect up your lap top for DVD; bikes (mountain edge) 17euros per day but we had for 4 days which reduced cost to 14 per day- includes helmet & lock; Klaus puts suggestions for walks including bus & train times on daily menu card on table - we used these twice & both Klaus & Veronika take care to ensure you know what you are doing and also ask how the day went afterward. Hotel has a large number of umbrellas fro use by guests. Very popular hotel and you can see why it has the tripadvisor reviews that it does. would recommend to one and all.
reviews.title: Home away from home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This isn't a swanky hotel with lots of amenities. It is a well-run, clean and comfortable hotel where the staff are great, the food is comforting and you are made to feel very welcome. Our room overlooked the front hotel garden and had a good sized balcony. It had comfortable beds, a great shower and plenty of storage. Breakfast was a selection of cereals, toast, fruits, cheeses and meats or cooked breakfast and you were able to make up a packed lunch which was a welcome addition. A very useful card was left on the table each morning showing the weather forecast for the day, suggestions of places to visit and the menu selection for the evening. The owners, Klaus and Veronika were always pleasant and would enquire what your plans were for the day and offer any additional tips to make your walk or journey more enjoyable. After going for a nice walk the afternoon tea/coffee and cake was just lovely and kept you going until the evening meal. The dinners offered a salad buffet, soup of the day, starter and a selection of three main courses (one vegetarian) plus desert. The food isn't fine dining but there was more than enough to suit everyone's tastes and it was well-cooked homely food.
reviews.title: Simply brilliant!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Kitzbuhel itself surprised us with the number of things to do in the immediate area. We thought the lift pass for 3 out of 7 days with the addition of using the buses anytime during that week at 43.50 euros each was excellent value.
reviews.title: WONDERFUL HOLIDAY AT EDELWEISS HOTEL

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Definitely recommend this hotel as great value for money.
reviews.title: A very special hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012
reviews.text: Klaus, Veronika and all the staff are absolutely top class with regards to customer service.
reviews.title: High attention to customer service and a very friendly atmosphere

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On arrival personally welcomed to the hotel given direction to where to leave our ski's in a secure room and our room was ready even though we arrived early.
reviews.title: Good for Families or Groups of Adults

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: In the brochure it stated small room but this was more than adequat.
reviews.title: Brilliant hotel in a great place made our wedding very special!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Klaus was always great with advice and directions from bus times to the best routes to get round the mountains.
reviews.title: Very Nice, shame about the locals!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food was excellent with plenty of soup, salads and starter with choice of main course and desserts.
reviews.title: Another fabulous holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just arrived back from Hotel Edelweiss and it is hard to find fault. It was my first time in Austria and had a great week. Weather was excellent, only one day that rained during our time out and about. Klaus and Veronika were great hosts and took an interest in each of their guests.
reviews.title: Hard to Fault

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Kitzbhuel itself is a nice town but not a lot going on the week we were there (2-9 June). Classic cars on the Saturday were great to see. Hotel well positioned for lifts up the mountains as well as trains and buses to places of interest.
reviews.title: Simply cannot fault this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Would definately to back.
reviews.title: 5 star service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: This was my fourth trip to Austria but I have to say, I have never stayed in a hotel as fantastic as the Edelweiss. It's pretty, it's spotless.. but that's not what makes it special.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Klaus and Veronika, who own and run the hotel, are incredible. So friendly, so welcoming and really helpful when it comes to planning places to go etc. Everything is run so professionally, they, and the rest of the staff including Reinhard and Sarah, make it seem effortless.
reviews.title: You will want to come back to this hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from a weeks holiday at the Edelweiss and it is everything thet the other reviews say, Klaus and Veronika are exceptional host even coming down to the minni bus on our last day to help with the luggage and say goodbye. The packed lunches they provided are something new to us and they were very welcome and sustained us until dinner time helped with afternoon tes and cakes.
reviews.title: Great holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: The hotel is very convenient for the town and public transport, altogether a great and we would like to return.
reviews.title: All round gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled solo
reviews.text: June 2012
reviews.title: Excellent value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Visited the Hotel Edelweiss for a last minute booking to get away from it all. The hotel is a few minutes walk from the town centre but all the better for it as it is peaceful and private. We had rooms on the 2nd floor which were a good size and spotlessly clean. We had balconies with beautiful views of the garden and mountains.
reviews.title: Wow- what a wonderful hotel- in a lovely location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The social areas of the hotel were clean and welcoming, in particular we liked the garden area with plenty of seating so we could sit outside in the late afternoon after walking during the day, shaded areas as well as sunny.
reviews.title: Even better than I expected
